attributes.action: Stop bashing the mothers that use formula instead of breast feeding
attributes.additional_details: Whilst I agree that breast is best, in some cases there are women that cannot Breast feed for what ever reason such as cancer or not producing milk. I am asking the government to stop the tirade on formula milk. Allow the price to be dropped, allow for the provision of buy one get one free, and allow consumers to use points from various bonus and club cards.
